original_text: The next day was the Jewish day of rest. So they put Jesus in that hole in the rock, because it was near.
korean_text: 이 날은 유대인의 준비일이요 또 무덤이 가까운 고로 예수를 거기 두니라

sentences.original_text: The next day was the Jewish day of rest
So they put Jesus in that hole in the rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 예수님을 바위의 그 구멍에 넣었습니다
